  • Method Details

    • findAnswer

      @GET @Produces("application/json") @Path("/answer") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response findAnswer​(@QueryParam("q") String input)
      Restful Service to find an answer to the input String. This function will: Convert the input string to an array of words Read all possible answers from the database Check if the word pair match is blacklisted Search for the best answer possible Return a json object with all important data
      Parameters:
      input - the Input String for which the service will search the correct answer for
      Returns:
      a json object with all found tags, bot certainties and original words and the answer

    • addAnsweredQuestionToDB

      private void addAnsweredQuestionToDB​(String question, List<BotResult> answeredQuestionBotResults, javax.persistence.EntityManager em)
      Add questions that can be answered to the db or update their statistics
      Parameters:
      question - the question itself, how it should be displayed
      answeredQuestionBotResults - all botresults with their tags that are used in the question and the answer the question gets
      em - the entity manager

    • isBlacklisted

      private boolean isBlacklisted​(String word, List<BlacklistEntry> blacklist)
      Method to check if a word is blacklisted. Goes through array and checks if it is contained.
      Parameters:
      word - the word we are looking for
      blacklist - the blacklist where the word may be contained
      Returns:
      if the word is blacklisted

    • isBadMatch

      private boolean isBadMatch​(String word, Tag tag, List<Match> matches)
      Method to check if a "Translation/Match" is bad. It's considered bad if upvotes / downvotes is under 0.666 and has 3 downvotes more then upvotes.
      Parameters:
      word - the matched word.
      tag - the tag with which the word was matched
      matches - the list of all matches
      Returns:
      if the match is bad

    • generateJSONResponse

      Method to generate the JSON Response for the Request
      Parameters:
      response - Object containing all important information for the response
      Returns:
      the JSON Object stringified
